function.name: get_7_day_weather_forecast
function.description: Get a 7-day weather forecast for a city.
function.long_description: Retrieves a 7-day weather forecast including temperature ranges, sun hours, and daily weather conditions for a specified city using an external weather API.

city.description: Name of the city to get the weather forecast for

example_user_queries: Show me the 7-day weather forecast for London
What will the weather be like this week in New York?
Weather forecast for next 7 days in Paris
How will the weather look this week in Berlin?
Give me a weekly weather outlook for Tokyo
What is the weather forecast for San Francisco this week?
